node.description: Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory.
Wrapper around OpenAI Chat large language models.

chat.message: Hi there, my name is Charlie.
Hello Charlie! It's nice to meet you. I'm an AI trained to assist and chat with people. How can I help you today?

chat.message: I am an artificial intelligence program designed to interact and assist people with various tasks and topics. I am constantly learning and improving my knowledge base through the conversations I have and the information I am exposed to. My main goal is to provide assistance and engage in meaningful conversations with users like yourself. I can help answer questions, provide recommendations, or simply chat about a wide range of topics. Feel free to ask me anything, and I'll do my best to help!
